attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop repressing and suppressing the British people. The almost daily round of ever more repressive and suppressive legislation is ruining the quality of our lives. 99.9999% of us are not criminals or terrosists. The government is using a sledge hammer to crack a walnut. GIVE US BACK OUR FREEDOM, LET US CHOOSE HOW WE WANT TO LIVE. STOP TELLING US WHAT WE CAN AND CANNOT DO. STOP TRYING TO CONTROL US. BE BOLD, REPEAL OPPRESSIVE LEGISLATION, NOT INTRODUCE MORE OF THE SAME.

rejection.details: Please give an explicit action for HM Government.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
